thread.section_title: The Future of Everything: A look ahead from the Wall Street Journal.
thread.title: Your Own Private, Prefab Museum. Just Add Art

author: Mark Ellwood
title: Your Own Private, Prefab Museum. Just Add Art
text:
Let’s say you’re a prolific, civic-minded art collector hoping to share your cache of paintings with the public. Even if your collection and construction budget pale in comparison to those of Eli Broad, a private museum—designed by a bona-fide starchitect—may be within reach.
Filipino developer Robbie Antonio, owner of Revolution Precrafted, has developed prefabricated private museum buildings in collaboration with an array of architects, including Pritzker Prize-winners Jean Nouvel and Christian de Portzamparc. All of the...
